console.overview-description: Here you can create and manage your assets, your policies and contract definitions, and review your contract negotiations and agreements.
console.assets-description: Assets are language resources comprising corpora (annotated or unannotated), lexical resources or pretrained models.
console.contracts-description: A Contract Definition specifies the Access Policy on a Data Asset, and the Usage Policy - duties, rules, and obligations one must follow.
console.negotiations-description: Here you can review all your contract offer negotiations.
console.transfer-history-description: Here you can review your entire asset transfer history.

catalog.catalog-description: Search and negotiate the available linguistic assets in the INESData language data space.
